PFTQ.name: Police Field Training Qualification
PFTQ.reason: Given upon becoming a Field Training Officer.

PDQ.name: Police Detective Qualification
PDQ.reason: Given upon completing the Detective Training Program.

PSQ.name: Police Supervisor Qualification
PSQ.reason: Given upon completing the Supervisor Training Program.

PCQ.name: Police Command Qualification
PCQ.reason: Given upon completing the Command Training Program.

PSFQ.name: Police Staff Qualification
PSFQ.reason: Given upon becoming a Staff Officer.

MOV.name: Medal of Valor
MOV.reason: For extraordinary bravery or heroism in the line of duty at extreme personal risk.

PMED.name: Police Medal
PMED.reason: For individual acts of heroism in the line of duty.

PSTAR.name: Police Star
PSTAR.reason: For exceptional judgment or skillful tactics in dangerous situations.

PLSM.name: Police Life Saving Medal
PLSM.reason: For rescuing or attempting to rescue a person from imminent danger.

PCSA.name: Police Chief Service Award
PCSA.reason: For impeccable service and extraordinary dedication.

PMA.name: Police Meritorious Achievement Medal
PMA.reason: For a noteworthy act or prolonged exceptional duty.

PECA.name: Police Exemplary Conduct Award
PECA.reason: Given every 3 months of clean service without discipline.

ESM.name: Event Service Medal
ESM.reason: Awarded for representing the department in official events.

SSM.name: Sharpshooter Medal
SSM.reason: Awarded for passing bonus achievement criteria in both MOUT courses.

MMED.name: Marksman Medal
MMED.reason: Awarded for passing bonus achievement criteria in one MOUT course.

OSR.name: Operations Service Ribbon
OSR.reason: Given for every 50 points earned in the Operations Bureau.

DSR.name: Detective Service Ribbon
DSR.reason: Given for every 45 Detective Bureau submissions completed.

SOSR.name: Special Operations Service Ribbon
SOSR.reason: Given for every 75 points earned in the Special Operations Bureau.

ASR.name: Administrative Service Ribbon
ASR.reason: Given every 250 points earned within Administrative Services Bureau.

FTPR.name: Field Training Program Ribbon
FTPR.reason: Given for every 50 hours of field training by a Field Training Officer.

PSR.name: Professional Standards Ribbon
PSR.reason: Given for 25 IA cases or 25 Public Communication points.
